name: Skåne County Agricultural Society Show in Malmö
obverse: A woman of Ingelstad stands with a rake. Behind her is a basket of fruit and hay.
reverse: Inscription in 6 lines with the coat of arms of Malmö below. A crown rests on the coat of arms.
description: This medal was made to commemorate the agriculture show held in Malmö, Sweden in 1914.
The show was planned by the Skåne County Agricultural Society.
